title: Erasure - Snow Globe - (2013)(Limited Edition) - Flac,Cue
description:
The pre-order for the Erasure Snow Globe Limited Edition Deluxe Box Set has now ended and has sold out.
 There will be a single production run of 3000 box sets only, they will not be reproduced once these have sold out.

The release date for all formats of the album, including the box set, is Monday 11 November.

I found my inner choirboy again. I thought I'd lost him but he was there all along. Andy Bell.

The deluxe box set contains 3 CD's; Snow Globe the album, a CD of exclusive tracks and a CD containing The Erasure
 Christmas Radio Show. It also includes items such as a festive tree bauble, desktop calendar, postcards, a Christmas
 card signed by Vince & Andy and more.

NOTE

The final CD is just one track unfortunately and has therefore been ripped as such.
  
==================================
Tracklist

Limited Edition Deluxe Box Set

CD1 - (Snow Globe)

Bells Of Love (Isabelle's of Love)
Gaudete
Make It Wonderful
Sleep Quietly
Silent Night
Loving Man
The Christmas Song
Bleak Midwinter
Blood On The Snow
There'll Be No Tomorrow
Midnight Clear
White Christmas
Silver Bells

CD2 (Bonus disc with exclusive audio content)

Gaudete (A Cappella version)
Stop The Cavalry (Acoustic version)
Silent Night (Instrumental version)
She Won't Be Home (redux)
Make It Wonderful (Acoustic version)
God Rest Ye Merry Gentlemen (redux)
White Christmas (Instrumental version)
Yes Virginia, There Is A Santa Claus (spoken word piece)

CD3 (The Erasure Christmas Radio Show)

Recorded Live Inside The Snow Globe
